languages.text: Экран когитатора чуть светится. Приглядевшись, вы понимаете, что нутро его выпотрошено и заменено свечами, дающими блик на черном плекс-стекле.
The cogitator's screen glows faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.
languages.original_text: Экран когитатора чуть светится. Приглядевшись, вы понимаете, что нутро его выпотрошено и заменено свечами, дающими блик на черном плекс-стекле.

traits.locale_text: The cogitator's screen is glowing faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, and its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.
The cogitator's screen is glowing faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, and its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.

The cogitator's screen glows faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.

languages.text: 考算機の画面がかすかに光っている。よく見ると、内部が抜き取られていることに気づいた。考算機の中身は黒いプレックスグラスに光を投影するロウソクに変わっている。
languages.original_text: The cogitator's screen glows faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.

traits.locale_text: 考算機の画面がかすかに光っている。よく見ると、内部が抜き取られていることに気づいた。考算機の中身は黒いプレックスグラスに光を投影するロウソクに変わっている。

languages.text: 沉思者的屏幕微微泛光。你仔细一看，才发现它的内部已经被掏空了，取而代之的是一堆蜡烛，在黑色的塑胶玻璃上闪闪发光。
languages.original_text: The cogitator's screen glows faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.

traits.locale_text: 思考器的屏幕微微泛光。你仔细一看，才发现它的内部已经被掏空了，取而代之的是一堆蜡烛，在黑色的塑胶玻璃上闪闪发光。

languages.text: L'écran du cogitateur émet une faible lueur. Alors que vous l'examinez de plus près, vous vous rendez compte que ses entrailles ont été remplacées par des bougies, dont la pâle lueur est reflétée par l'écran noir en flexiverre.
languages.original_text: The cogitator's screen glows faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.

traits.locale_text: L'écran du cogitateur émet une faible lueur. Alors que vous l'examinez de plus près, vous vous rendez compte que ses entrailles ont été remplacées par des bougies, dont la pâle lueur est reflétée par l'écran noir en flexiverre.

languages.text: La pantalla del cogitador emite un leve brillo. Al observarlo más de cerca, te das cuenta de que lo han vaciado y reemplazado los elementos de su interior con velas que proyectan destellos en el plexividrio negro.
languages.original_text: The cogitator's screen glows faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.

traits.locale_text: La pantalla del cogitador emite un leve brillo. Al observarlo más de cerca, te das cuenta de que lo han vaciado y reemplazado los elementos de su interior con velas que proyectan destellos en el plexividrio negro.

languages.text: Der Bildschirm des Cogitators leuchtet schwach. Du siehst näher hin und erkennst, dass er ausgeschlachtet wurde. Sein Inneres wurde durch Kerzen ersetzt, deren Flammen sich flackernd auf dem schwarzen Plexglas spiegeln.
languages.original_text: The cogitator's screen glows faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.

traits.locale_text: Der Bildschirm des Cogitators leuchtet schwach. Du siehst näher hin und erkennst, dass er ausgeschlachtet wurde. Sein Inneres wurde durch Kerzen ersetzt, deren Flammen sich flackernd auf dem schwarzen Plexglas spiegeln.

languages.text: Kavramsayarın ekranı hafifçe parıldıyor. Yakından baktığında içinin boşaltıldığını ve yerine, ışıkları siyah pleksi camdan yansıyan mumlar yerleştirildiğini görüyorsun.
languages.original_text: The cogitator's screen glows faintly. You take a closer look and realise it has been gutted, its innards replaced with candles that cast glints on the black plex-glass.

traits.locale_text: Kavramsayarın ekranı hafifçe parıldıyor. Yakından bakıyorsun ve iç organlarının boşaltıldığını ve yerlerine, ışıkları siyah akrilik camlardan yansıyan mumlar yerleştirildiğini görüyorsun.
